content.webTitle: Manchester United expect Real Madrid to renew interest in David de Gea

fields.headline: Manchester United expect Real Madrid to renew interest in David de Gea
fields.bodyText: Manchester United expect David de Gea to be the subject of another Real Madrid bid this summer despite their determined stance that the goalkeeper will not be sold. Real are aware of United’s position but are undeterred and may soon indicate their desire to prise the 26-year-old away from Old Trafford. De Gea came close to joining Real two years ago when Louis van Gaal was the United manager. José Mourinho does not want the Spaniard to leave and United believe that, because he is not agitating for a move and has two years left on his contract, their position is far stronger than in 2015.
